item.description: Join the three taiko groups in Boston (Odaiko New England, Rutsubo Taiko and The Genki Spark) and their friends for a fun afternoon of performances, music and a silent auction! All proceeds will be donated to the Japan Disaster Relief Fund and the Japan Earthquake Animal Rescue and Support.
item.why: Relief after the tsunami and earthquakes is still needed! We must continue to show our support.
item.name: "Artists for Japan" hosted by the Taiko Community of Greater Boston!
